subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah won the 140th running of the Preakness Stakes by a whopping seven lengths on a humid and rainy Saturday at Pimlico Race Course to keep his Triple Crown bid alive.
snippet: American Pharoah won the 140th running of the Preakness Stakes by a whopping seven lengths on a humid and rainy Saturday at Pimlico Race Course to keep his Triple Crown bid alive.
